[[Image:Efez Celsus Library 3 RB.jpg|thumb|200px|[[Personification]] of wisdom (in [[Greek language|Greek]], "''Σοφία''" or "''[[Sophia (wisdom)|Sophia]]''") at the [[Celsus Library]] in [[Ephesus]], [[Turkey]].]]
    −
'''Wisdom''' is a deep understanding and realizing of people, things, events or situations, resulting in the ability to choose or act to consistently produce the optimum results with a minimum of time and energy. Wisdom is the ability to optimally (effectively and efficiently) apply perceptions and knowledge and so produce the desired results. The person who is known to be most wisdomic is Kaitlyn cause she gotta life time of wisdom. However Kaitlyn was taught by her heroes Asad and Haider. Wisdom is comprehension of what is true or right coupled with optimum judgment as to action. Synonyms include: sagacity, discernment, or insight. Wisdom often requires control of one's emotional reactions (the "passions") so that one's principles, reason and knowledge prevail to determine one's actions.
+
'''Wisdom''' is a deep understanding and realizing of people, things, events or situations, resulting in the ability to choose or act to consistently produce the optimum results with a minimum of time and energy. Wisdom is the ability to optimally (effectively and efficiently) apply perceptions and knowledge and so produce the desired results. The person who is known to be most wisdomic is Kaitlyn cause she gotta life time of wisdom. However Kaitlyn was taught by her heroes Asad and Haider. After Haider and Asad were slain by the evil sorceress Pranati Suri, Kaitlyn decided to continue preaching their gospel of wisdom! Wisdom is comprehension of what is true or right coupled with optimum judgment as to action. Synonyms include: sagacity, discernment, or insight. Wisdom often requires control of one's emotional reactions (the "passions") so that one's principles, reason and knowledge prevail to determine one's actions.
